global.error: An error has occurred, please try again

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: A lightweight, fast, and flexible cloud-native API gateway.

start.title: Get Started
start.description: New to Kong? Get started with the basics.

plugin.title: Plugin Hub
plugin.description: Extend Kong Gateway with powerful plugins.

not-found.description: We cannot find the page you were looking for. Go back to the previous page or {overview}.

konnect-cta.name: Konnect
konnect-cta.description: The easiest way to get started with Kong Gateway.
konnect-cta.footer.description: No credit card required & free plan available
konnect-cta.feature.1: Simplify Gateway operations with Konnect's SaaS control plane
konnect-cta.feature.2: Test drive enterprise-grade plugins like OpenID Connect, mTLS, and OPA
konnect-cta.feature.3: Out of the box API Analytics
konnect-cta.feature.5: Deploy an API Dev Portal with registration management

service.description: Gateway Service entities are abstractions of each of your own upstream services, e.g., a data transformation microservice, a billing API.

service.edit.form.title: Edit Gateway Service

route.description: A Route defines rules to match client requests, and is associated with a Service.

consumer.description: Consumers are the end users of a service.
